mention.text: the brutal beating of a Southern California man
this week from an amateur cameraman 's videotape
an American Civil Liberties Union spokesman who grew up in the community `` black people
spokesman who grew up in the community
Rodney Glen King , the victim of the beating
King , who had been released from jail in December after serving 2 1/2 years on a second-degree robbery conviction
Los Angeles Police Chief Daryl Gates
